Texture:soft
Fragrance:mabango
Effectiveness:maybe a little

It holds the curl but maybe not for so long. After ko kasi i curl I brushed my hair kaya nagloose ung curls. Then after an hour nawala na ung curl ng hair ko. Maybe it depends on the hair type since I have thick strands and hair. I am using dyson airwrap for my curls.

Product Name: Tresemme Hair Styling Spray Protecting Heat 8oz
Comment: Malambor sa hair and walang strong smell. Very luxe ng packaging and maganda yung lock

Product Name: Tresemme Hair Styling Spray Protecting Heat 8oz
Comment: Really good heat protection spray! It saves my hair from heat styling everyday. God knows how damaged my hair will be without this. Will repurchase as this isn’t sticky as other heat protection hairsprays.
